intro: Everettia acutifolia, commonly known as the narrow-leaved everettia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical Africa and is characterized by its slender, evergreen shrub form. The plant features opposite, lance-shaped leaves that are typically covered in fine hairs.
